name: Memento Mori (itch) (BambiDesOceans, adrigollum, Sally0-0)
description: Bound by fate, Liv and Astrid have an uncommon story. Hit by a tragedy, mother and daughter will need  both of them to go the end of the road. Go with them in their expedition keeping your spiritual energy at a certain level or the shadows will submerge you. When the light becomes weak, only love will save you.
